- Canh kim chi kèm chén cơm: món này mình thích ăn nhất nè, vì cơm tím ở hanuri ăn vừa dẻo lại thơm, màu tím nhìn khá bắt mắt, canh chua chua cay cay, bên trong có nấm kim châm với thịt ba chỉ, nhưng mà thịt hơi ít >.<

Unlike other fast food pizza chains, Pizza 4P's offers more distinct quality pizza along with excellent service.
Flavour selection of their pizza and pasta seems to be more creative and brings a hint of Japanese style (those with Salmon sashimi, Teriyaki, Japanese ginger pork).
I guess there are only a few people know that this pizza chain is founded and operated by Japanese, not Italian!
You can order 1 pizza with 2 different flavours like I did, Teriyaki with beef. This salmon pasta is one of the best I've ever had. Sweet pizza is little bit dry though. The marou chocolate tart seems to be a seasonal option, and it is fantastic...
The ambience is cozy, modern yet refined. Staffs are very helpful and warming.
This time we especially chose the seats right in front of the pizza oven to enjoy the food while watching the chef preparing each pizza, very relaxing and enjoyable.
